titles.title: Estate Tax Sunset Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the estate and gift tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/13/1998--Introduced. Estate Tax Sunset Act - Repeals Subtitle B (Estate and Gift Taxes) of the Internal Revenue Code. Makes such repeal effective to the estates of decedents dying, and gifts and generation-skipping transfers made, after December 31, 2001.
